title:
PR Newswire
about an hour ago
text:
Looking back at the #pressreleases distributed by PR Newswire in 2023 provides us with a nice snapshot of where brands are leaning when it comes to telling their story – whether it be to journalists, investors, analysts, or direct to consumers. 📰🎯

Read our recent blog post, which covers some of the big trends like #ESG and #AI as well as some of the top-performing multimedia to cross the wire: https://brnw.ch/21wFd64 🔗

text:

Stories include the TIME Person of the Year 🏆 and Alaska Airlines' plans to combine with Hawaiian Airlines. ✈️
